entry.string: Choose a translation to work on

While working inside the translations module, you always work on the translation of one particular locale. You choose that locale below. It will activate the proper storage location for the translated items while you are working on a translation.
entry.translation: While working inside the translations module, you always work on the translation of one particular locale. You choose that locale below. It will activate the proper storage location for the translated items while you are working on a translation.

entry.string: If you don't see the locale you want in the dropdown below, you will need to create it and activate it in the Modify Config page of the Base module.
entry.translation: If you don't see the locale you want in the dropdown below, you will need to create it and activate it in the Modify Config page of the Base module.
